node.statement: Final assembly: Combining the Poisson moment formulation E[X^n] = (1/e) sum_{k>=0} k^n/k! with the Stirling expansion k^n = sum_{j=0}^{n} S(n,j) k^{underline{j}}, we obtain (1/e) sum_{k>=0} (sum_{j=0}^{n} S(n,j) k^{underline{j}})/k!. By fubini-tonelli (all terms non-negative), interchange sums: sum_{j=0}^{n} S(n,j) * (1/e) sum_{k>=0} k^{underline{j}}/k! = sum_{j=0}^{n} S(n,j) * 1 = B_n.
